articles.description: If you own an Xbox -- Series X|S or One -- you should own a Game Pass subscription.
articles.content:
Microsoft
The Xbox Series X|S are alive, in the wild and, for some reason, being vaped into. Both consoles, the powerful X and the smaller, cheaper S, launched on Nov. 10 after months of anticipatio… [+7761 chars]
